name: About
body:
# Dalil Greben
18.11.1992

Back-end developer

098-059-09-69
greben.danil@gmail.com
skype://sdswanderer
https://ua.linkedin.com/in/sdswanderer
https://github.com/sdswanderer


***

### Programming languages, frameworks, libraries 
* **JavaScript**: Node.js, Express, Mongoose, Q
* **Perl**: Mojolicious, RoseDBObject, Moose
* Python: SQLAlchemy, pyQt, NumPy
* PHP: Slim, Propel, Guzzle

### DBMS
**MySQL**
**MongoDB**
PostgreSQL
SQLite

### Tools
Git + GitLab + GitLabCI
Trac, Redmine

### OS
Linux: Debian-based, RedHat-based
Windows

### Education
2011 - 2012г. – IP telephony special course at PortaOne SIP Lab (National Technical University of “Ukraine Kyiv Polytechnic Institute”)
2013 - 2015г. – Open international university of human development “Ukraine”

### Expirience
2010 –  “Vepr” magazine, designer
**from 2012 – WebbyLab, Back-end developer**

### Additional information 
* Analytical mind
* Sophisticated tasks solution
* Purposeful and persistent
* Even­tempered and thoughtful
* Easily trained
* References
* Available upon request
